Title: Alien: Romulus
Writer: Dan O'Bannon, Ronald Shusett, Fede Alvarez
Actors: Cailee Spaeny, David Jonsson, Archie Renaux
Plot: While scavenging the deep ends of a derelict space station, a group of young space colonists come face to face with the most terrifying life form in the universe.
Country: United Kingdom, United States, Hungary, Australia, New Zealand, Canada
